metadata.title: Basic Catalog A
metadata.remarks: A basic catalog created to capture basic catalog elements and functionality for interoperability testing.

parts.name: statement
parts.prose: All endpoints automatically lock after {{ insert: param, A-1.param1 }} minutes of inactivity.

params.label: An integer value representing the minimum number of total characters required in a password.
An integer value representing the minimum number of numerals required in a password.

parts.name: statement
parts.prose: All passwords must be at least {{ insert: param, A-2.param1 }} character(s) long and include at least {{ insert: param, A-2.param2 }} numeral(s).
